modName: Ursine Armor - Stormcloak and Imperial soldiers replacer - UNP
summary: Replacement for the soldiers armours in the game with the Ursine Armor Pack by nsp13 / Deserter X
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Tahoma][size=2][color=#ff7700][size=3]I'VE MADE A NEW AND EXTENDED VERSION OF THIS MOD THAT DOESN'T USES ANY .ESP, ONLY REPLACES THE MESHES

You can try it [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60841/?]here[/url]

________________________________________________[/size][/color][/size][/font][/center]

I absolutely love the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55924/?]Ursine Armor Pack UNP[/url] by nsp13 / Deserter X, and I've made (initially for myself) a replacement for the armors of the female soldiers in the game (not the guards, only imperial and stormcloak soldiers), but I've decided to share it.

As nsp13 said in his mod: "If you want to use any of the non vanilla meshes of this mod please credit the original creators listed bellow. Anything else you can use freely as long as you credit my work in the comments"

And, of course, I credit all those authors for his awesome work:

Armor meshes UNP Minidresses Collection by Tiwa44
"Half" Bra mesh Brokefoots UNP Mashup Compilation by brokefoot
Armlets and Barbarian Cloak meshes Ashara Princes of the Woods for UNP and male by SydneyB
Cuisse mesh UNP Undies by Petrovich
Underwear mesh Osare Underwear - UNP by anano
Collar mesh R18Pn Set - Inner Wear Set for UNP and CBBEV3 by NPR

And how could it be otherwise, I credit nsp13 / Deserter X for his great mod that you need to have installed to have this one to work.


I use the HDT version, but I been unable to do it work with the NPCs (I don't know if it's possible) and for that purpose I've included the meshes of the non HDT boots: if you use the non HDT version ignore the message to overwrite.
author: PeCool

files.name: Ursine Armor - Stormcloak and Imperial soldiers replacer - UNP
